pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, June 21, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, June 21, 2016:

Gatineau, Quebec

5:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Aboriginal Day Sunrise Ceremony.

Canadian Museum of History
100 Laurier Street
Gatineau, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage (photo opportunity)
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:30 a.m.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
